history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to go?For example, you can say I'm going to the airport
USER Childrens Hospital
TTS Okay, going to upmc children's hospital of pittsburgh. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 08:24 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 19 minutes, and you will take 1 bus.<break time='800ms'/>If you would like to go by driving instead, please say start over, and then choose driving directions. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 7 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Craig St at Park Plaza. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER repeat

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 7 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Craig St at Park Plaza. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER the pin you
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER continue

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 93 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Main St at Penn avenue NS.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 8:45pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER next
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 4 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 4401 Penn avenue. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
